title: Arabic calibri in Illustrator
content:
Friends,

I have a small situation and need help.  
I received a label layout in microsoft Excel (?!). I want to re-do it in illustrator.  
Its a simple label only with latin and arabic text.  
When I open the excel file the label presents the fonts correctly, but if I do a copy and paste it in illustrator the characters disappear.  
How do I set Arabic text in illustrator? The font is Calibri.

António
author: afonseca1974

comments.content: Calibri doesn't include Arabic, so you're seeing some kind of font fallback.

hmmm...anyone here knows what font fallback is set for windows 7?

AF

Illustrator does not support Arabic layout unless you get the Middle East version from WinSoft. Probably what you will need to do, once you've figured out what Arabic font to use, is to set the Arabic text in e.g. Word (Windows, not Mac), print to PDF, and embed the PDF as a graphic in Illustrator.
